channel.title: Batman scavenger Hunt?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Batman scavenger Hunt?"

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: Just as well, you avoided a ban I believe…

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: Can someone please explain how you eneter the contest?

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: Well I finally finished the scavenger hunt, the item in BvS isn't too bad. Though getting items is not much of any issue for my characters in the game ^_^ Check out Scavenger Hunt Reward for info on the item. Apologies in advance if I am not allowed to post what reward one receives for completing the scavenger hunt. Now just to buy the DVDs from a local retailer in Australia @_@

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: use the link on the vid pop up to hyperlink to a different adress that gives advice on the next vid

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: I'd like to know why the SECOND video isn't being recorded as found, myself … I can watch the thing, then I go back to the site and nothing changes.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: No, they can't. Stop testing me on this, I really don't enjoy banning people over this.

item.content:encoded: the scavanger hunt dosen't work for me and i was wondering if someone can just send me the code?

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: User from the IP address 84.254.25.0, your post has been removed and you've been banned for posting the code here.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
i think you all are mistaken… the problem is that the fourth video WOULD NOT LOAD…… i clicked the link and the page says
CONGRATULATIONS! You have found one of the EXCLUSIVE Batman Gotham Knight video clips.

but apparently nothing happens….. I'm pretty sure everyone else is experiencing this and for those who have no idea please do not comment >.>

people who know how to rectify this problem please reply this post… I believe many are stuck in this situation and i believe bvs would want us to watch the
2 remaining videos…. unless it's all a sham… as i have loaded the ads for about 200 times now…..

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: searching the codes with Ctlr+f is also affective

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
@Anonymous (80.171.40.237)
The video itself is not on the Main Page, but the link to the page with the video is. If you're using Firefox or IE, try Ctrl+F and searching for the words "Gotham Night" <—- yes, Night, they spelled it wrong.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: I'm confused. What do you do with the codes once you have them?

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: i really wish someone would link us the 4th video, ive been stuck at that part for days and tecnically it would still give bvs money since we are watching the links.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
@Rauros

The only video i found on the main page is this on here:
http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/3240/scavengerhuntbq2.jpg

But i´m sure this can´t be the video. Every other link takes me to another site.
I know the answer consists from 4 words. But I have no idea how to find the other videos.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
same, and the biggest problem with it is that for the most part, the codes are too hard to find. The biggest problem in my opinion is they say "search" when half the time they mean look for it, and the other half they mean putt into the search bar.

the item: http://bvs.wikidot.com/items:utility-belt

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: If you're having trouble finding the link on the fourth video, keep looking on the MAIN PAGE. The link is there, just keeping looking. And if it takes you to another site completely, you clicked on the wrong one.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: BrightMorn, that'd be how it's supposed to work, but one of the sites seems to have screwed something up with that. It seems like a majority of the people have been having trouble with that site, and even to the point were McMasters asked people to give it some time to be fixed on the front page for BvS.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: The easiest way I found was to click the image that had the CODE and it takes you to the site where you need to look for the CODE. Each of these sites typically have a search feature on the site, put the CODE in there (use correct capitals) and you are good. Then click the link given to you that links back to the first page. The whole thing went smoothly for me, took only a few minutes to finish.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: Well I tried the 4th clip and nothing, I don't think I can win the prize unless they allow international entries. All I miss out on is +20 stamina and a permanent item that does what exactly?

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
@Anonymous (91.188.33.174)

Umm because McM wants to have more money put in his pocket so he can make the game better. But your banned any way for posting the code so don't worry lol

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
Okay, maybe I'm confused, but I don't understand how this search works.

I've found videos 2, 3 and 4 through Google.

When I go there and click the links to return to the main page, the 'lock' icon does not disappear over the videos.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
But i dont ander stand WHY cant we post the code???

Because it would defeat the entire purpose, which is to earn some much needed scratch for BvS. If the code were posted then a lot of people who could actually finish the hunt would just skip and get the shiny.

That said, I don't think that there's any problem with posting what the code is not. Since many people will try to brute force it anyway, here's some of the words I tried before a friend of mine loaned me his specifically configured browser: Batmobile, Blue-Ray Player, Utility Belt. These are the spellings and capitalization I used. The code may need to be in all Lower Case. Or Upper Case. Who knows?

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: Thanks BvS-Uzuki Now i know the code! :) But i dont ander stand WHY cant we post the code???

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: I guess the links to the 5th and 6th clip are not allowed to be posted correct? From what has been said here and on other boards is that the 4th clip doesn't show up at all.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: Read the text on the last page, and read the text on the page where you're supposed to input the code in Billy. Just finish the sentence.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded: I can't talk too much about the contract, BUT, the videos should not be hard to find. note that I say 'should'. I'm looking into a timetable as to when the other sites are up to standard, and not, well, crashy.

item.title: Re: Batman scavenger Hunt?
item.content:encoded:
I can´t find the 2nd video. When visiting ANN I searched for the right code.
He found an article. At the end of this article: "Congratulations — You have found the Batman Gotham Nights hidden trailer #2. Please return to www.bgkvideosweeps.com to enter to win a Blu-ray Disc Player and a copy of Batman Gotham Knight"
I returned but I couldn´t watch the second trailer.
What was wrong?
